com.netflix.genie.server.jobmanager.impl

Class JobManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.server.jobmanager.impl.JobManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrestoJobManagerImpl, YarnJobManagerImpl

    public class JobManagerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements JobManager
    Generic base implementation of the JobManager interface.
